heroDescription: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the heart of Africa. Discover breathtaking landscapes, majestic wildlife, and rich cultures.
heroImageAlt: African savanna at sunset with wildlife
featuresSubtitle: A Safari Experience Like No Other
featuresDescription: We offer personalized safari experiences that go beyond the ordinary. Here's what sets us apart:

1.title: Expert Guides
1.description: Our experienced guides have in-depth knowledge of African wildlife and ecosystems.

2.title: Luxury Accommodations
2.description: Stay in handpicked lodges and camps that combine comfort with authentic African charm.

3.title: Sustainable Tourism
3.description: We're committed to responsible tourism that supports local communities and conservation.

4.title: Tailored Itineraries
4.description: Customized safari experiences designed to match your interests and preferences.

testimonials.title: What Our Travelers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our guests have to say about their experiences.

1.text: The best safari experience of our lives! The guides were incredibly knowledgeable and made sure we saw the Big Five.
1.name: Sarah Johnson

2.text: Nyika Safaris went above and beyond to create a personalized itinerary for our family. The kids are still talking about it!
2.name: Michael Chen

3.text: As a solo female traveler, I felt completely safe and well taken care of throughout my journey. Highly recommend!
3.name: Amina Bello
